oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hemphill School - Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hemphill Diesel Schools; insurance; commercial properties; Massachusetts Bonding and Insurance Company; A. E. Pipkin and Sons; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from J. A. Pipkin, an agent for the Massachusetts Bonding and Insurance Company, to G. M. Logan of Hemphill Schools, Inc.: "At your request, we have examined the premises occupied by the Hemphill Schools, Inc., and are pleased to state that in our opinion the premises are entirely safe for occupancy, as they are now being used...."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pipkin, J. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: typed, white ink on black paper, 8.5 x 11 in.
